subject: Special offer
body:
Dear valued member.
Read this special pharmacy bulletin from the leading Canadian on-line drug store. 
You can buy high quality Canadian products for the price lower than for American drugs.Save on your drugs.
For more information click herehttp://yetplan.hk
Experienced team, personal customer care, prompt delivery.No scamming, no frauds.
Sincerely yours,Terrell Abernathy
